name: Selra
background: A compassionate healer from the devout village of Havenwood, a town heavily influenced by the Champions of Order. She believes in harmony and the protection of the innocent, but is forced to question her faith when she witnesses the brutality of the Champions firsthand.
narrative_hook: Selra is torn between her deeply held faith in Elysia's goodness and the increasingly cruel actions of the Champions. Her personal quest is to find a balance between order and compassion, and to define her own faith.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Selra's compassionate and protective nature, specializing in abilities that mend wounds, cleanse ailments, and provide sanctuary for allies.

talents.name: Heal
talents.effect: As a major action, you restore 1d10 Vitality to a single ally within 30 feet.

talents.name: Inspire
talents.effect: As a major action, you grant an ally within 30 feet a +2 bonus to their next roll.

talents.name: Divine Ward (Reaction)
talents.effect: Grants a temporary shield that absorbs up to 5 points of magical damage for 1 round.

talents.name: Soothing Presence (Modifies Inspire)
talents.effect: When you use Inspire, it now restores 1d4 Resolve to the affected ally in addition to its other effects.

talents.name: Shield of the Faithful (Modifies Divine Ward)
talents.effect: Your Divine Ward now absorbs up to 8 points of magical damage.

talents.name: Cleansing Touch
talents.effect: As a major action, you touch a target and remove one minor negative status effect (e.g., Blinded, Slowed). This can be used once per short rest.

talents.name: Mending Light (Modifies Heal)
talents.effect: Your Heal ability now restores an additional 1d4 Vitality.

talents.name: Mass Cleansing
talents.effect: As a major action, you can remove one negative status effect from all allies within a 15-foot radius. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Elysian Aegis (Modifies Divine Ward)
talents.effect: You can choose to expend 5 points of your own Resolve to use your Divine Ward ability on two allies simultaneously.

talents.name: Unwavering Faith
talents.effect: When you successfully heal an ally, they also gain a temporary shield that absorbs up to 5 points of damage until the end of the next round. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Sanctified Ground (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you consecrate a 10-foot radius area for the duration of the combat. All allies within this area gain a +1 bonus to their Spirit and their Resolve is restored by 1 point at the start of each of their turns. This ability can be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.

playstyles.description: This path focuses on Selra's fervent faith, allowing her to smite foes with divine magic and act as a front-line holy warrior.

talents.name: Sacred Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, you make a melee attack imbued with light magic, dealing 1d8 light damage instead of physical. This attack uses your Spirit attribute.

talents.name: Divine Barrier
talents.effect: As a reaction when you are attacked, you can create a temporary shield of holy energy that grants you a +2 bonus to your defense roll. This costs 1 Resolve.

talents.name: Aura of Retribution
talents.effect: As a major action, you create an aura of divine judgment. Any enemy that hits you with a melee attack takes 1d6 light damage. This costs 5 Resolve.

talents.name: Resolute Will
talents.effect: You have Advantage on checks to resist mind-altering or possession effects, especially those from chaotic or draconic sources.

talents.name: Blinding Light (Modifies Sacred Strike)
talents.effect: Your Sacred Strike now has a chance to blind the target. On a successful hit, the target must make a Mind DC 14 check or be Blinded for 1 round. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Searing Light
talents.effect: As a major action, you unleash a bolt of pure energy at a single target, dealing 3d10 light damage. This costs 10 Resolve.

talents.name: Pillar of Judgment
talents.effect: As a major action, you call down a pillar of searing light from the heavens. All enemies in a 15-foot radius take 4d10 light damage. This costs 15 Resolve.

talents.name: Righteous Vengeance
talents.effect: When an enemy reduces an ally to 0 Vitality, you can use your reaction to make an immediate Sacred Strike against that enemy with advantage.

talents.name: Smite the Unholy (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you unleash a torrent of holy judgment. This deals 6d12 light damage to all enemies you can see, and they must succeed on a Spirit DC 18 check or be Stunned for 1 round. This can only be used once per day and costs 20 Resolve.
